anyOf.title: Pre-defined configurations
enum: DDDSUUDDDD (5ms,   7DL/2UL), S-slot=6DL:4GP:4UL, same ratios as default
DDDSUUUUDD (5ms,   5DL/4UL), S-slot=6DL:4GP:4UL, balanced downlink and uplink
DDSUUUUUUU (5ms,   2DL/7UL), S-slot=6DL:4GP:4UL, EXPERIMENTAL very high uplink

pattern1.title: First TDD Pattern
pattern1.description: Definition of the first TDD pattern.

pattern2.title: Second TDD Pattern (optional)
pattern2.description: Definition of the second TDD pattern.

dl_nr_arfcn.title: DL NR ARFCN
dl_nr_arfcn.description: Downlink NR Absolute Radio Frequency Channel Number of the cell

ul_nr_arfcn.title: UL NR ARFCN
ul_nr_arfcn.description: Uplink NR Absolute Radio Frequency Channel Number of the cell. By default a frequency corresponding to dl_nr_arfcn and nr_band is chosen.

ssb_nr_arfcn.title: SSB NR ARFCN
ssb_nr_arfcn.description: SSB NR Absolute Radio Frequency Channel Number of the cell. If set it must be an element of global synchronization raster and be at offset from center DL frequency that aligns with SSB subcarrier spacing of selected band. By default a valid frequency nearby dl_nr_arfcn is chosen.

ssb_pos_bitmap.title: SSB Position Bitmap
ssb_pos_bitmap.description: SSB position bitmap in bits (4, 8 or 64 bits depending on the DL frequency).

root_sequence_index.description: Range 0 to 837 for PRACH format up to 3, 0 to 137 otherwise. prach-RootSequenceIndex parameter. It must be different for each neighbour cell operating on the same frequency and sharing the same PRACH configuration.

trs_presence.title: Expert: TRS Presence
trs_presence.description: Expert only: Add NZP CSI-RS resources for TRS.

prach_config_index.title: Expert: Prach Config Index
prach_config_index.description: Expert Only: Integer (range 0 to 262). prach-ConfigurationIndex parameter. Default is 160 or 156 depending on TDD configuration

uss.title: Expert: PDCCH UE Search Space
uss.description: Expert only: PDCCH UE dedicated search space configuration defined in RRC PDCCH-Config. Default value depends on TDD configuration, see generated configuration file in Monitor App as a reference

n_candidates.title: Number of Candidates List
n_candidates.description: Mandatory for the DL BWP #0. nrofCandidates parameters for each aggregation level (1, 2, 4, 8, 16).

n_candidates_1.title: Number of Candidates for aggregation level 1

n_candidates_2.title: Number of Candidates for aggregation level 2

n_candidates_4.title: Number of Candidates for aggregation level 4

n_candidates_8.title: Number of Candidates for aggregation level 8

n_candidates_16.title: Number of Candidates for aggregation level 16

dci_0_1_and_1_1.title: DCI 0_1 and DCI 1_1
dci_0_1_and_1_1.description: It defines whether DCI 0_1 and 1_1 are used for PDCCH in the search space. It is relevant only if css is false.

cipher_algo_pref.title: Preferred Cipher algorithms
cipher_algo_pref.decription: Set the preferred algorithms for RRC and User Plane encryption in decreasing order of preference. If none match the UE capabilities, then NEA0 (no encryption) is selected

integ_algo_pref.title: Preferred Integrity algorithms
integ_algo_pref.decription: Set the preferred algorithms for RRC integrity (and optionally User Plane integrity) check in decreasing order of preference. If none match the UE capabilities, then NIA0 (no integrity check) is selected. (Default: NIA2, NIA1)

tac.title: Tracking Area Code
tac.description: Tracking Area Code (range: 0x0001 to 0xffffff except 0xfffffe, format: integer or hexadecimal starting by 0x)

dl_symbols.title: Downlink Symbols
dl_symbols.description: Number of downlink symbols after the last complete downlink slot.

ul_symbols.title: Uplink Symbols
ul_symbols.description: Number of uplink symbols before the first complete uplink slot.
